episodes.title: The Kidwelly Sex Cult Season 3 Episode 360
episodes.description: HEY ALL! We're taking a break...but never fear! If you're not a patron, these episodes will be all new to you! If you're a patron, we will still be uploading NEW episodes all this month there. Thank you all so much for your continued support. It means the world! We'll be back to our regularly scheduled nonsense in June! TW/CW: Sui*ide, SA, CSA, CA In the seaside town of Kidwelly, a cult resided. They claimed to be Mormons, but they were instead a made up religion by pedophile Colin Batley where he groomed the children of the single mothers he brainwashed. Join us as we discuss this disgusting cult. Support the Show.

episodes.title: Order of the Solar Temple Cult Season 3 Episode 334
episodes.description: TW/CW: su*cide, infant deathin 1984 two men would found the Order of the Solar Temple. A decade later they and all their followers would be dead. Join us as we explore this strange, deadly new age cult based on the Knights Templar, Western esotericism and greed. Our links (patreon, discord, merch and more!) :https://linktr.ee/cruelteaLillian: lillianasterios@icloud.comMerris's new podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/lillian1640Support the show
